name: EQI
description:
You find yourself in a digital world that twists and changes around you, challenging your senses, focus, and reflexes. Interface with the great mystery and transcend.

- Explore and solve over 20 stages, increasing in size and difficulty.
- Control your own movement and shift the world around you.
- Solve puzzles, see through illusions, and master challenging obstacle courses.
- Immerse yourself in the electronic pulse of the game's OST.
intro: EQI is a trippy first-person arcade game with spatial puzzles and a synthwave soul.
